email_body: Hi, my name is John Doe and I need help resetting my password. My email is john.doe@example.com.
Hello, I was charged twice on my credit card. Can you fix this billing error?
My app crashes every time I open it. Please look into it.
I cannot access my account since I changed my phone number.
I think I was wrongly billed this month. Kindly review the charges.
My username and password don't work after the last update.
The mobile app closes automatically after login. Help needed.
I see an unknown transaction on my credit card. Please investigate.
The reset link sent to my email does not work. Please resend.
The new update has broken the voice chat feature. Kindly check.
